DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive either thalidomide 1 2 dos placebo 8 week . Patients respond may continue double-blinded treatment additional 4 week ; nonresponding patient may receive thalidomide 4 week . Per amendment , patient may receive thalidomide 12 week compassionate basis .
